tag_list: video, videography, blogger, podcaster, brighton, filmmaker
overview:
Olly Newport is a young digital media creative based in Brighton in the United Kingdom.

As a freelance videographer, Olly works with Chris Leydon and TechCrunch Europe to produce content for TechCrunch TV; as well as working independently creating videos commercially for startups, musicians and creative agencies.

Olly often works with his friend and sound recordist Chris Leydon to produce videos for tech events and companies through Keyone Productions.

video_embeds.embed_code: Snoopers Paradise from Olly Newport on Vimeo.
video_embeds.description: If there was a shop that you could spend hours inside, Snoopers Paradise would probably be it. Slap bang in the middle of Brighton’s North Laines, Snoopers sells anything and everything, from antiques to vintage clothing.

video_embeds.embed_code: Katy & I from Olly Newport on Vimeo.
video_embeds.description: What is your obsession?… for Jack Moore it’s pop-star Katy Perry who he idolises in every way imaginable.

video_embeds.embed_code: Coin from Olly Newport on Vimeo.
video_embeds.description: Just think of all those pennies you simply discard everyday. THEY HAVE LIVES TOO!

video_embeds.embed_code: Hot Chocolate from Olly Newport on Vimeo.
video_embeds.description: shivers wow it’s cold outside, so what’s better than a nice, bubbly, warm hot chocolate to satisfy the taste buds?

video_embeds.embed_code: Snow from Olly Newport on Vimeo.
video_embeds.description: Snow; the weather you love to hate. Filmed in Brighton at 2am on the 1st of December, the night of the major southern snowfall in the UK. It’s -3Â° C, everything is cold… yet people are still out photographing and playing around in the icy wonderland.
